response.original_title: ရာဇဝင် ရိုင်းခဲ့သည်
response.overview: Yazawin is a handsome, confident photographer — the kind of man whose looks could captivate any woman. But beneath that striking surface lies a heart filled with unseen pain and invisible scars.  When you look at him, you can almost sense he’s about to do something wild, impulsive… maybe even reckless.  Htet Naing is a rising model — a romantic at heart who truly believes in love. As a model, it’s impossible for him to avoid the world of photoshoots…  But when Htet Naing meets Yazawin, the mesmerizing photographer whose charm could make even a man stare — their encounter changes everything.
response.title: Yar Zawin Yine Khae The
